title: Xiaomi's newly-unveiled SU7 EV quietly brought to India, to be showcased in Bengaluru; no news on launch date
description: The car will be showcased in Bengaluru, although the company has stated there are "no plans" for an immediate launch in India. This exhibition may be a move to test the waters in the Indian car market or to celebrate a decade of Xiaomi's business operations in the country.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
